column4: hi, i am new to 11.04 and i am wondering why i do not see the new colom on the left for the new desktop style? what am i doing wrong am i using gnome and not unity some how?
At this moment, thinking of neat script to prevent and punish someone PM me constantly.
You using Classic gnome not Unity. At login before typing password, at bottom bat choose Unity as your session, ans do not PM people, if not asked
Do not use /msg or /query, just "qin: message here"
my problem is unity is not on my list
Try to type in terminal: lsb_release -sc
You sure that you type it right?
Ok, in terminal: "sudo apt-get install unity unity-common" or use synaptic to install it.
Yes it should, have you upgraded from Maveric?
does unity need compiz to work?
Yes, but unity-2d does not, or i think so.
